reviews.review: Muito bom o jogo o que estraga e os chiter
idiot game i can't play on workshop maps
新出的信任模式我死活进不去，我就想好好玩个游戏，我连电脑带的软件都卸了好几个了，我觉得可能有问题的都卸了，就是进不去。
Игра очень хорошая, но после новых (больших) обновлений всё стало хуже.

Sağlam bir anti-cheat sistemi ile yeniden zirveye ulaşabilir. Ama Valve denen çöp kutusu uğraşmıyor. Çünkü ban yiyen oyuncuların tekrardan yeni hesap satın alabileceğini düşünüyor. Güzelim oyuna yazık oluyor.

对新手很不友好 遇到挂概率也很高
但是狙可太好玩啦
great game to play with friends
one of he best FPS games ever made

I dont know if this has ever been posted before but I think the community should set a certain day of the week as (Overwatch day) and try to overwatch as many cases as possible for like an hour maybe.

When thousands of people come together to solve cases I think a good number of cheaters in the game can be banned faster and help reduce this issue plaguing the game.
blyat fun game to rage and play with friends
Если бы не читаки то норм
weri gud gaem onli tere ar a bit chetohs and gud game weri gud

Really wicked game.
Although the hilariously inaccurate accuracy of the guns can be rage inducing, it's fun to learn how to control the recoil.
Spent many fun hours playing comp games with the boys.
Definitely a game to get for anyone on Steam that's into FPS games.
dis game good but ur gonna waste money for knives XD
ruslarla girildiğinde kanser olma garantisi olan bir oyun. Sigara alkol falan hikaye.
Боже тупые малолетки смотрят патруль и банят всех подряд
Hay más hackers que jugadores normales :V
"Лучшая система фактора доверия", 5-7 репортов на сильверах и вы  будете играть против читеров, спасибо папаша Valve за этот траст фактор красного цвета 20 века!
